video.title: Disney Animation Collection: Vol. 5: Wind in the Willows
video.synopsis: In this charming animated classic, the incorrigible J. Thaddeus Toad is about to lose the home he loves, Toad Manor, thanks to his excessive spending.

episodes.synopsis: Included are Wind in the Willows, The Ugly Duckling, The Grasshopper and the Ants, The Golden Touch, The Robber Kitten and The Wise Little Hen.
episodes.title: Play All Six: Vol. 5

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Toad's friends try to help him when his obsession with transportation vehicles leads to the loss of the deed to Toad Hall and a car theft charge.
episodes.title: Wind In The Willows

episodes.synopsis: A mother hen scorns a little ugly duckling hatched with other chicks. A cyclone carries all the chicks to the river. Ugly duckling rescues family chicks from going over a waterfall and becomes hero of the family.
episodes.title: The Ugly Duckling

episodes.synopsis: An adventurous young male kitten runs away from home to become a robber and joins up with a notorious badman. When he is robbed and nearly frightened out of his wits, he returns home and even submits to a bath.
episodes.title: The Robber Kitten

episodes.synopsis: When a lazy grasshoper prefers to sing and dance rather than forage like his friends the ants, he learns to regret it when winter approaches. The ants save his life and in return he entertains them with his music.
episodes.title: The Grasshopper And The Ants

episodes.synopsis: A hen is planting and harvesting corn, but Peter Pig and Donald refuse to help due to their "tummy aches". When the time comes to enjoy the fruits of her labor, the hen only offers Peter and Donald castor oil!
episodes.title: The Wise Little Hen

episodes.synopsis: Greedy King Midas wants more treasure, so a magical dwarf grants him the power to turn anything he touches to gold. But even his food turns to gold!
episodes.title: The Golden Touch
